content: Can someone more familiar with the AST API (that is, anyone) take a look at #2948? I'm sure I'm horribly misusing it. Also, the Option<_> test seems to fail even though it works in Code.
for the Option test, keep in mind that unit tests don't have the standard library. you need to define Option yourself to use it
I thought about that, but other tests use Option without defining it. Maybe they don't expect Some to resolve.
Is it here that I can ask questions about rust-analyzer AstNodes?
A new topic would probably make more sense, but you can ask here
